title: Giannis dominates, leads Bucks to NBA Cup final
description: Giannis Antetokounmpo scored 32 points and came one assist shy of a triple-double to lead the Bucks past the Hawks and into the NBA Cup final.

title: Raiders' Crosby needs ankle surgery; season over
description: Maxx Crosby will undergo arthroscopic ankle surgery that will end his 2024 season after aggravating the injury last weekend against the Bucs.
author: Adam Schefter

title: Frustration, anger & fighting - Wolves' unity falling apart
description: The unity Gary O'Neil quickly built at Wolves is in danger of falling apart after tempers frayed again following their defeat by Ipswich.

title: 'We have to put them away' - do Arsenal need to sign a striker?
description: Arsenal were held to a goalless draw by Everton on Saturday, so does Mikel Arteta need to sign a striker in January?

title: Jonas beats Habazin to set up Price clash in 2025
description: Natasha Jonas teed up a possible blockbuster showdown with Lauren Price as she overcame Ivana Habazin via unanimous decision to become unified IBF and WBC welterweight world champion in Liverpool on Saturday night.

title: Arteta defends 'tactical' Odegaard sub as Slot lauds Liverpool character
description: Mikel Arteta defended his decision to substitute Martin Odegaard as Arsenal were held to a goalless draw by Everton and missed the chance to close the gap to leaders Liverpool.

title: Odds are QBs win the Heisman ... but not tonight
description: There's a great chance a quarterback WILL NOT lift the trophy — for just the fifth time in the 2000s — at Saturday's ceremony in New York City.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: No. 5 Kentucky holds off Louisville in chippy rivalry match as Wildcats' Lamont Butler drops 33 points
description: A skirmish broke out in the second half of Kentucky's 93-85 win over Louisville.
author: Yahoo Sports
